# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/ckeditor__ckeditor5-utils`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for @ckeditor/ckeditor5-utils (https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor5/tree/master/packages/ckeditor5-utils).
